Posts.Content: Hugs to you I so underdtand. I found lump, two weeks later at the appointment I Had Needle test. Then two weeks later results inconclusive so mammography ultra sound and core test. Now waiting 2 weeks for results, actually ten days now. I so hope you get good news. By the way I’m an oldie 72 yrs just.  Love and good wishes to you all. The forum is great. Not sure whether to mention to friends or if seems inappropriate. I always seem to have something. Anyway wishing everyone a peaceful day.
Posts.Title: Keeping fingers crossed

Posts.Content: I’m waiting for results too. Sorry can’t help but sending warm wishes and good luck XX
